body.name: SAMSUNG Galaxy Watch 6 40mm Bluetooth Smartwatch w/ Fitness Tracker, Personalized HR Zones, Advanced Sleep Coaching, Heart Monitor, BIA Sensor, US Version, Gold (Renewed)

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: KEEP YOUR GOALS ON TRACK: Workout to your full potential with fitness tracking* on Galaxy Watch6; Get insights on duration, distance, calories burned and more; Watch recognizes activities from running to swimming and tracks over 90 other exercises

FIND YOUR ZONE: Zone in on the results you want with personalized heart rate zones**; Watch scans your health data to provide HR zones tailored just for you; Target your preferred intensity to maintain the heart rate needed to achieve your goals

SLEEP COACH ON YOUR WRIST: Get the insights to develop better sleep habits with Advanced Sleep Coaching*; Use Watch to plan your bedtime, detect snoring*** and understand and track your sleep stages (awake, light, deep, REM)

ALWAYS-ON HEART MONITORING****: Your Watch continually scans your heart rate to inform you when it’s detected an irregular rhythm that might be A-fib — a heart-related abnormality that can lead to serious complications

KNOW YOUR BODY INSIDE & OUT: Stay in the know about your body with the advanced BIA sensor*****; Use your Watch to get readings on body fat, skeletal muscle, body water, Body Mass Index (BMI) and more*

KEEP CONNECTED ON THE GO: Your Watch syncs with your other Galaxy devices seamlessly so you can play your favorite music, control your smartphone camera, make calls, text and do more from anywhere******

OUR LARGEST WATCH DISPLAY YET: See even more on our largest display yet******* and quickly navigate apps thanks to an improved interface; Plus, durable crystal glass keeps screen looking great and protected from bumps and scratches

MAKE MOVES IN STYLE: Match any mood or style with a wide variety of bands — now even easier to swap with one simple click********; Then accent your look with an assortment of new and enhanced Watch faces
body.description: The lightweight Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 smartwatch has a 40mm size, heart rate monitor, sleep tracking and fitness features to help you stay active and healthy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was a little weary purchasing a refurbished watch but this one came in excellent condition. This is my second Samsung watch. Love all the new features!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't be afraid to buy
reviews.reviewText: Great product. You can save alot of money on these refurbished. Most of the time it's just someone who changed mind and returned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Good Battery Life
reviews.reviewText: Great value for a refurbished product. No issues whatsoever; very good battery life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is my first watch that links to my phone. I love everything about it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Samsung Galaxy watch
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful in color and smooth texture. Sadly, a factory reset glitch anytime wearing it, and would not recommend it to anyone.I returned it for a refund and look forward to finding something with similar features.#Dontbuy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Just know, it's refurbished
reviews.reviewText: I was not expecting a box that had already been opened, nor a refurbished watch either. The price reflected a new, unused device, so I was not pleased about that. Which is why it has a three star review. The watch works, and it should, it's only wifi/Bluetooth capable. I'm just peaved at the fact that I was expecting a new, untouched, unused device for the price of a new device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Took a chance and bought renewed. Arrived looking and functioning like brand new! Zero flaws (worn for a week so far). Coming from a Gear2 (which still works) this is a step up. Some functions only work with a Samsung phone, which I do not have, is a bit disappointing, but it may give me an excuse to upgrade that too. I wish battery life was better, I get a full day /day and a half, was hoping for 3/4 like my husband gets with his watch5 (or 4?) Overall I'm really happy with this purchase and happy to save $!
